 2007-13502007-09-18,  FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the STREAMLINED ACCOUNTING (GST/HST) REGULATIONS in order to increase the GST and HST rebates to municipalities, to extend the health care rebate to eligible charities that provide health care services, and to amend the remittance formulae for eligible public service bodies as per the 1% reduction in the GST.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0203 Publication Date: 2007-10-03
